pr_title: sync code from release-2.6.2 into dev

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #701 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

update release_node.txt and ChangeLog.md
add async method for CRUD Service

Merge pull request #703 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

add async method for CRUD Service
fix queryCNS when constructor Contract object

Merge pull request #704 from ywy2090/release-2.6.2

add getBlockLimit and Deprecated getBlockNumberCache
